QuestData.Title: Storm Chasing
QuestData.Description:
<Watu rips the shard out and gasps for air.>
I...completely lost control. Olekk was right. This terrible magic has to be the primalists' doing. Please, stop them!
I must get my brother back to camp.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the Primalists' source of storm magic.
QuestData.RewardText: You've returned! I felt the destruction of the source from here.
